CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crystal Cove Villas relative to Green Valley Homes?
SRP.A: Crystal Cove Villas is {below} Green Valley Homes in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crystal Cove Villas}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Green Valley Homes}.

VE.Q: What is Green Valley Homes's Rental Yield in 1983?
VE.A: Green Valley Homes's rental yield in 1983 is {5.05} %.

VE.Q: What is Crystal Cove Villas's Rental Yield in 1984?
VE.A: Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield in 1984 is {7.99} %.

VE.Q: What is Sunstone Lofts's Rental Yield in 1983?
VE.A: Sunstone Lofts's rental yield in 1983 is {5.22} %.

VE.Q: What are the rental yield of Crystal Cove Villas, Sunstone Lofts, and Green Valley Homes in 1987?
VE.A: Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield is {10.53} %, Sunstone Lofts's rental yield is {3.88} %, Green Valley Homes's rental yield is {3.14} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum rental yield is {3.14} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum rental yield is {10.53} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas reached approximately {10.53} % in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas's lowest recorded level is approximately {5.92} % in {1981}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Rental Yield?
SC.A: The average total rental yield is {17.53} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Rental Yield go below 17.50 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield exceed 17.60 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1981 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1981 was {higher} than in 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1985, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1984 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1981 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1984 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1985 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1983 and 1984 was {higher} than between 1985 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1987, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1985 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1984 and 1986.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crystal Cove Villas} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Green Valley Homes, Sunstone Lofts, Crystal Cove Villas}.
